original_title: National Theatre at Home: Death of England: Delroy
overview: Michael Balogun plays Delroy with 'firecracker energy’ (★★★★ Evening Standard) in this new work by Clint Dyer and Roy Williams, which explores a Black working class man searching for truth and confronting his relationship with Great Britain.  Following national Coronovirus measures, Death of England: Delroy was forced to close mid-way through its run.
title: National Theatre at Home: Death of England: Delroy
